## Quick introduction

### About AERzip

AERzip is an open-source Python package which provides useful tools to allow **AEDAT files compression and decompression**, thus decreasing the disk space required for storage.

### Installing

You can install AERzip via pip thanks to its [PyPi](https://pypi.org/project/AERzip/) distribution:

```
pip install AERzip
```

### GitHub Repository

The AERzip's source code can be found in its [GitHub repository](https://github.com/alvaroy96/AERzip).
